nodes.text: The Immortal was a name which Yrica Quell, a New Republic pilot who was working as a mole in the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing, thought of when trying to determine the name of the Unyielding, an Imperial-class Star Destroyer commanded by the Imperial Colonel Madrighast, in 5 ABY.
The Immortal was mentioned in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, the third installment of the Star Wars: Alphabet Squadron trilogy which was written by Alexander Freed.
